title: We observed 2 groups of swing voters in Arizona. They say ICE should be reformed
description: Concerns about the tactics of federal immigration agents remain front of mind for some key voters who supported President Trump in 2024.
content: Concerns about the tactics of federal immigration agents remain front of mind for some key voters who supported President Trump in 2024.
